dimensions.name: accuracy
dimensions.description: Correctness of the answer relative to source content

rubric.1: Answer is factually wrong or contradicts source material
rubric.2: Answer has significant errors or misleading statements
rubric.3: Answer is mostly correct with minor inaccuracies
rubric.4: Answer is correct with no significant errors
rubric.5: Answer is precise, correct, and well-supported by sources

dimensions.name: completeness
dimensions.description: Whether all relevant information from available sources is included

rubric.1: Answer is missing most relevant information
rubric.2: Answer covers less than half of available relevant information
rubric.3: Answer covers the main points but misses some relevant details
rubric.4: Answer is thorough with minor omissions
rubric.5: Answer covers all relevant information from available sources

dimensions.name: citation_quality
dimensions.description: Proper source attribution with file paths

rubric.1: No citations or source references provided
rubric.2: Vague references without specific file paths
rubric.3: Some citations present but inconsistent or incomplete
rubric.4: Most claims cited with specific file paths
rubric.5: All claims properly cited with specific file paths and line references

dimensions.name: response_time
dimensions.description: Wall-clock time from question to complete answer

thresholds.description: Quality score must remain within 0.5 points of baseline on every dimension
